entry.title: My Take on the Shadow Broker
entry.content:
Enjoy this while playing your favorite XBox game and kicking ass the Asari way.

Ingredients:

  • 1 shot Blue Curacao

  • 2 shots Vodka (Pick your poison, but I stick with Grey Goose)

  • 2 shots Hypnotiq

  • Lemon-Lime soda (I prefer Sprite)

  • Margarita mix

  • 8-10 Blueberries

  • Ice (optional, your liquor should be cold already)

Process:

  1. Place the blueberries in the glass.

  2. Add vodka

  3. Add Hypnotiq

  4. Add Blue Curacao

  5. Pour equal parts soda and Margarita mix to top

entry.title: Getting Started
entry.content:
Welcome to my (generated) blog. I will be updating this in the near future, but for now, I’m just getting used to Octopress.

Don’t judge the (tacky) standard page layout as that will be changing, too.

Please keep checking back for the day when I actually post something worthwhile on a variety of topics.

TJ
